pageTitle: Aston Villa - Villa Draw QPR in the Carling Cup
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {13406=Another Big Signing Due In For AVFC? Transfer News (Tuesday July 28 2015), 13815=Kozak Brace Almost Sinks Wolves (Wednesday July 29 2015), 14609=Audio - Gray's Adebayor Concern (Wednesday July 29 2015), 15005=Blackburn Striker Set For Medical? (Thursday July 30 2015), 13614=An (Jose) ANGEL (Crespo) Descends On AVFC (Tuesday July 28 2015), 28842=Date:Saturday August 30 2008, 14204=Tamworth Trip Tonight (Wednesday July 29 2015), 14013=Crespo Talks Fish & Chips (Wednesday July 29 2015), 13188=Mud Slide Tim & The Claret & Blue Horizon (Tuesday July 28 2015), 28796=Time: 2:19PM, 31533=Aston Villa are set to host Ian Dowie`s Queens Park Rangers in the 3rd Round of the Carling Cup. Villa are making their debut in this years competition, with European antics allowing us to enter the tournament at the 3rd stage. QPR meanwhile have had to overcome fellow forgotten Premier League cannon fodder Swindon, and Carlisle United. The last time the Villa faced QPR, they were a lot poorer, and JPA, Vassell AND Nobby Solano all managed to score on the same day! The tie will be played in the week beginning the 22nd September., 14408=Adebayor - Now Berbatov - And Baker (Wednesday July 29 2015), 14802=U21s - Tamworth 3-0 Villa (Thursday July 30 2015)}
